item.title: Bitcoin August Historical Return: 4 Rises, 8 Falls since 2013
item.description: On August 1st, based on Coinglass data, among the 12 "August" markets in Bitcoin's history since 2013, there were 4 gains and 8 losses. The largest increase took place in August 2017, with a monthly gain of 65.32%. The largest decrease occurred in August 2015, with a monthly loss of 18.67%. From 2013 to the present, the average return rate of Bitcoin in "August" markets is 1.75%, and the median return rate is -8.04%.

item.title: U.S. publicly traded company Intchains Group partners with FalconX to expand ETH strategic reserve
item.description: On August 1st, Intchains Group (ICG), a company listed in the US, announced a partnership with FalconX. This partnership is intended to expand its ETH strategic reserve. The goal is to enhance the efficiency of ETH acquisition and launch structured ETH yield products.

item.title: Standard Chartered: Targeting to Submit Hong Kong Stablecoin License Application Soon
item.description: August 1st. According to a report by Radio Television Hong Kong, the CEO of Standard Chartered in Hong Kong, Greater China, and North Asia stated that the group is still in the process of studying the newly released stablecoin-related documents by the Hong Kong Monetary Authority. With the implementation of the Stablecoin Regulations, Standard Chartered is exploring possible options and use cases with the goal of submitting a stablecoin license application as soon as feasible.

item.title: James Wynn's PEPE Long in another address was liquidated, with a total loss exceeding $1 million.
item.description: On August 1st, as monitored by LookOnChain, the long position of James Wynn's PEPE in another wallet address also underwent a series of liquidations. The total loss exceeded $1 million, leaving only $14,850 in the account.Yesterday, after James Wynn's main wallet address's 10x PEPE long position was partially liquidated 9 times in a row, it closed out and withdrew $32,931 from Hyperliquid and deposited it into Binance. As a result of this long position, James Wynn suffered another loss of $1.24 million.

item.title: Alleged Figma Founder's Address Holds Over $1.7 Million Worth of AGLD Token
item.description: On August 1st, according to Arkham data, the address where Dylan Field, the suspected founder of Figma, is located holds more than 2.3 million AGLD tokens, which are worth $1.76 million and represent the largest holding of this address. In addition, the address also holds ETH, PEOPLE, and LOOT NFT.

item.title: U.S. publicly traded company Mill City has completed a $450 million private fundraising round and established the SUI Treasury, holding approximately 76 million SUI tokens.
item.description: On August 1st, according to TheBlock, the publicly traded company Mill City Ventures in the US has officially set up its SUI Token Reserve after completing a $450 million private placement financing. Currently, it holds a total of 76,271,187 SUI tokens, with an average purchase price of $3.6389 per token. All these tokens were acquired through an OTC agreement with the Sui Foundation. Mill City has declared that it will continue to purchase SUI on the open market and plans to use approximately 98% of the net proceeds from the private placement to buy SUI tokens and manage the reserve.

item.title: Bitunix Analyst: US June PCE Inflation Rebound + Tax Hike Risk Rise, BTC Testing Pressure Triangle Apex, Short-Term Support Holds Firm at 117,000
item.description: August 1st. In the US, the year-on-year rate of the June core PCE was recorded at 2.8%, which was higher than expected and the revised value, marking the fastest inflation rate since February. Meanwhile, both overall PCE and consumer spending rose in tandem, highlighting the resurgence of inflationary pressure. Meanwhile, a weak labor market and stagnant real income have reinforced the risks of economic slowdown. The market expects this Friday's jobs report to further confirm the decline in the momentum of hiring, adding uncertainty to the policy path.On the BTC front, the daily chart shows that the price has gradually converged after consolidating from a high level. It is currently testing the endpoint of the triangle formed by the descending trendline and horizontal support. The range of 118,500â€“118,800 serves as short-term resistance, and 116,300 is strong support. The liquidation heat map also shows that a large amount of liquidation buy orders are concentrated around 117,000 bel

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Surges Above $116,000
item.description: Update: On August 1st, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin witnessed a rebound and exceeded $116,000. The current price stands at $116,012.

item.title: Binance Announcement on P2P Nickname and Avatar Adjustment
item.description: August 1st, Binance will initiate the synchronization of user nicknames across different products starting from August 4, 2025, at 00:00 (UTC). The P2P nicknames will gradually merge with the nicknames of other accounts on the platform. In addition, avatars will also be adjusted. The avatars in Binance accounts will be utilized in some scenarios of Binance P2P, and this implementation will be completed by the end of August 2025. Existing users can edit their nicknames in the P2P profiles, Binance profiles, or Square profiles, and these modifications will be automatically synchronized across all other profiles on the entire Binance platform.

item.title: Trump's Equivalent Tariffs Effective Date Postponed by One Week to August 7th
item.description: On Thursday night local time on August 1st, US President Trump signed an executive order imposing tariffs ranging from 15% to 41% on goods exported to the United States from 67 trading partners, raising the tariff level to the highest in over a century. Nevertheless, the new tariffs will not come into effect until August 7th instead of the originally scheduled August 1st, providing other countries with another opportunity to attempt to negotiate for lower tariffs. A senior government official stated, "This is of historical significance; this is a new trading system. This is what I refer to as the Trump Round of Negotiations." White House officials said on Thursday night that they hope to reach more agreements with other countries prior to the new tariff implementation date of August 7th. (Jinse Finance)
